name: yellow-flute
effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Cures confusion.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A glass flute that
snaps POKéMON
out of confusion.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A glass flute that
snaps POKéMON
out of confusion.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A yellow glass flute that snaps one
POKéMON out of confusion.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A yellow flute made from blown glass.
Its melody snaps a single Pokémon out
of confusion.

A yellow flute made from blown glass.
Its melody snaps a single Pokémon out
of confusion.

A yellow flute made from blown glass.

of confusion.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
A toy flute made from yellow glass.
A maniac will buy it for a high price.

A toy flute made from yellow glass.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
